summary: Policy Service Specialist III with proven ability to negotiate and resolve escalated complaints, strong leadership and communication skills, and extensive knowledge of DMV/auto insurance across CA, TX, NM and claims reporting. Experienced in call center management, portal insurance systems (PRIME, HUON, Claims Portal, PEPSC), Microsoft Suite, and cross-state auto/home/umbrella insurance; able to drive process improvements and deliver high member satisfaction.
skills: Negotiation and resolution of escalated complaints
DMV, Automotive, CA, TX, NM insurance
Portal Insurance operating systems: PRIME, HUON, Claims Portal, PEPSC
Knowledge of wage/hour and labor law

experience.title: Policy Service Specialist III
experience.description: Proficient in providing world-class member service in a high-volume call center; assisted supervisors with call monitoring and peer coaching; continued education across three states for membership, California auto, collector car, home, assigned risk, and umbrella insurance; enhanced service to members.

experience.title: Co-Owner/Manager
experience.description: Managed a staff of seven barbers and beauticians; interviewing, license verification, and hiring; advertised/promoted the salon; built client relationships to gain loyalty.

experience.title: Supervisor of the Call Center and the Travel Production Center
experience.description: Coached and developed staff to ensure continual education and self-esteem; fostered service culture; communicated with team through meetings; empowered agents to handle escalated issues; managed up to 21 agents; integrated Travel Production Center with task force for permanent process improvements; analyzed call activity and identified opportunities to improve the member experience.

experience.title: Accomplishments
experience.description: Communicated with insureds, banks, mortgagees, and lien holders; explained benefits and changes; re-underwrote policies to comply with underwriting guidelines; reviewed policy contracts; answered questions regarding deductibles.
